item.title: New Regeneration
item.content:encoded:
Since kaiju now die when they are crippled at dayroll instead of the kage killing them, McM changed how Shin Goji regenerates hp. The first day he ate my villagers, he regained 1800, the second day 1500. Since he attacks for 7 days, I think that his regeneration is 1800-300*(dayrolls passed since summoned) hp at dayroll.

EDUT: He still regenerates the 5000 when he is crippled. I misread the post on the kaiju earlier.
